suppress.notes: file name: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Contracts.dll, Microsoft.AspNetCore.dll, dotnet-aspnet-codegenerator-design.dll We are not exposing a SOAP endpoint and are not using MailBee Webmail
file name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.dll We are locking down access to the Azure resource by using IP restrictions via VNets, and further protecting by ensuring users are against the UKHO AAD.
